titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 263) to amend the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981 to clarify provisions enacted by the Captive Wildlife Safety Act, to further the conservation of certain wildlife species, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4040) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend telehealth flexibilities under the Medicare program, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 263) to amend the Lacey Act Amendments of 1981 to clarify provisions enacted by the Captive Wildlife Safety Act, to further the conservation of certain wildlife species, and for other purposes, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4040) to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend telehealth flexibilities under the Medicare program, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-444, by Mrs. Torres (CA).
Resolution provides for one hour of general debate and one motion to recommit on each bill. H. Res. 517 is considered adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 90.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1256.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 208 (Roll no. 394).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 395).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 263 and H.R. 4040.
